alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Jackson; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 3:20PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson and eastern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, northwestern Wakulla, Gadsden, Liberty and southwestern Leon Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 415 PM EDT/315 PM CDT/... At 319 PM EDT/219 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Blountstown to 6 miles northeast of Stonemill Creek. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quincy, Blountstown, Greensboro, Chattahoochee, Orange, Sneads, Gretna, Bristol, Rock Bluff, Jewel Fire Tower, Juniper, Douglas City, Selman, Vilas, Central City, Scotts Ferry, Kennys Mill, Poplar Camp, Kern and Quincy Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Jackson; Leon; Liberty
